original: KUGELBERG, Wilhelm Bertil, Direktör, Nockeby, f Sthlm 31/7 00 av övering W K o Amy Kylberg, gm Märta Forsling. Studex N Real 18, fil kand Upps 22, jur kand 23, tingstjg 24—27. Tjg Svea hovr, kamm.koll o eckl.dep 27—28, dir.ass Sv arb.giv.frn allm grupp 28—36, led aff.bk :nas löneförhandl.nmd 36, vkst dir Bk mas forhandl.org 37-42, Försäkr.bol d:o 42, v. vkst dir Sv arb.giv.frn sed. 42, bitr omb.m o omb.m Rörledn.fm:as riksfrb 31—36, förhandl.sakk Kont.maskinhandl frn 33—36, Metallgjut:as frn Sthlm 35—36, Sv livförs.anst Trygg 33—42, livförs.bol Framtiden 34—42, Försv.väs verkst.nmd 42, suppl arb.domst sed. 42, deleg f int soc.polit samarb sed. 42, Statens lönekontr.nmd 43, flm i frn Norden 43, led styr f Sv Norgehj arb.utsk sed. 42, ordf sv o norsk-amer donat.komm 43, styrled frn Gamla stockholmare sed. 38, Sthlms nat 1. kurator 22—23. Resor: Engl 20, Tyskl 21, Frankr 22, Holl, Belg, Ital, Österr 33. RVO.
translated: KUGELBERG, Wilhelm Bertil, Director, Nockeby, b Stockholm 31/7 00 to former W K and Amy Kylberg, mar Märta Forsling. Bachelor of Science in Natural Sciences 18, Bachelor of Arts Upps 22, Juris Doctor 23, Judicial Clerk 24-27. Employed by Svea Court of Appeal, Chamber of Commerce and Trade Department 27-28, Assistant Director of the Swedish Employers' Confederation 28-36, member of the committee for negotiating wages in national banks 36, Deputy Director of the Banking and Insurance Employers' Association 37-42, Insurance Company 42, Vice Deputy Director of the Swedish Employers' Confederation from 42, Assistant and Assistant Secretary of the National Pipeline Association 31-36, negotiating expert for the Mechanical Equipment Dealers 33-36, Metal Casting Association in Stockholm 35-36, Swedish Life Insurance Establishment "Trygg" 33-42, Life Insurance Company "Framtiden" 34-42, Defense Equipment Manufacturing Board 42, Substitute for Labor Court from 42, Delegate for International Social and Political Cooperation from 42, State Wage Contract Committee 43, member of the Nordic Film Board 43, chairman of the Swedish-Norwegian Aid Committee 43, board member of the Society of Old Stockholmers from 38, 1st Curator of the Stockholm National Museum 22-23. Travels: England 20, Germany 21, France 22, Netherlands, Belgium, Italy, Austria 33. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
